mapper.sql: t.id, t.org_code, t.outpat_form_no, t.outpat_diag_code, t.outpat_diag_name, t.diag_date, t.diag_type_code, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from outpatient_diag where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into outpatient_diag ( org_code, outpat_form_no, outpat_diag_code, outpat_diag_name, diag_date, diag_type_code, last_update_dtime ) values( #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatDiagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatDiagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update outpatient_diag set org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outpat_form_no = #{outpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outpat_diag_code = #{outpatDiagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outpat_diag_name = #{outpatDiagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diag_date = #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diag_type_code = #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
